Package server

Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
server.ServerController
public class ServerController extends Object
Controller for the BPARK server connection screen. Handles port input from the user, starts the server, and manages UI updates.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ServerApp
    app
    Reference to the ServerApp, used to start the server

    btnExit
    Button to shut down the server application

    Button to connect and start the server

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerController

      public ServerController()

  • Method Details

    • setApp

      public void setApp(ServerApp app)
      Links this controller with the ServerApp instance.
      Parameters:
      app - the ServerApp used to launch the server

    • setStage

      public void setStage(Stage stage)
      Passes the stage from ServerApp to this controller. Required in order to move the undecorated window with mouse drag.
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary JavaFX stage (window)

    • getport

      private String getport()
      Reads the port value from the input field.
      Returns:
      the port number as a string

    • connect

      public void connect(ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Called when the "Connect" button is clicked. Validates the port input and starts the server.
      Parameters:
      event - the button click event
      Throws:
      Exception - if server startup fails

    • showConnectedClients

      public void showConnectedClients()
      Shows the list of currently connected clients in the text area.

    • exitApplication

      public void exitApplication()
      Runs when the Exit button is pressed in the server UI. Steps: - If we have a running server, call shutdownGracefully() on it. - Stop the timeline that refreshes the clients list. - Exit the JVM.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(Alert.AlertType type, String title, String message)
      Displays a JavaFX alert with a given message.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of alert (INFO, WARNING, etc.)
      title - the title of the alert window
      message - the message to show

    • startAutoClientListUpdater

      private void startAutoClientListUpdater()
      Starts a timeline that refreshes the client list every 5 seconds.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      JavaFX initialize method. Sets a default port value in the text field on load, and attaches mouse listeners for dragging the undecorated window. in addition, call the method that change the pipe of print

    • addLog

      public void addLog(String message)
      Adds a new message to the log area in the server GUI. This method appends the given message with a line break and scrolls the log to show the most recent entry at the bottom.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to add to the log.

    • appendText

      private void appendText(String text)
      Adds the given text to the log area in the UI. This runs on the JavaFX thread using Platform.runLater().
      Parameters:
      text - the text to append to the log

    • redirectSystemStreams

      private void redirectSystemStreams()
      redirects the stadard output- out and err- to log area. the console is in GUI of server
